headline: Create the app your business needs, without coding.
description:
Glide is a web-based app builder that allows non-programmers to quickly create powerful and beautiful apps by combining prebuilt components with a familiar spreadsheet model.

App development has barely changed in 30 years. Glide will bring app development out of the Dark Ages, making it web-based, collaborative, and fun. Think of Google Docs or Figma but for building apps.

We believe that almost all apps can be built 10-100x faster, with higher quality, by starting with the data model and generating a polished app from high-level components that users customize.

Our mission is to make it easy and fun for anyone to build amazing apps without code. In ten years, we want the majority of apps worldwide to have been built with Glide.

We're four technical founders with expertise in native mobile frameworks, developer tools, and product design. We've worked together for 5-10 years, and were all early employees at Xamarin, a mobile developer tools startup acquired by Microsoft in 2016.

**Company Overview: Glide**

Founded in 2019 and based in San Francisco, Glide is a no-code app development platform that empowers businesses to create apps effortlessly, without the need for coding skills. The company originally emerged from Y Combinator’s Winter 2019 batch and was founded by a team of four experienced tech founders, all of whom have a shared history at Xamarin, a Microsoft-acquired mobile developer tools startup.

**Mission and Vision:**

Glide’s mission is simple and ambitious: to make app development accessible, fun, and efficient for everyone. Their belief is that most applications can be created 10 to 100 times faster using a structured data model combined with customizable high-level components. In the next decade, they aspire for the majority of apps worldwide to be constructed using their platform.

**Product Offering:**

Glide transforms the traditional and cumbersome process of app development into a streamlined, collaborative, and enjoyable experience akin to platforms like Google Docs or Figma, but specifically for apps. Their platform allows users to:

- Build modern, intelligent applications with no coding required.
- Automate manual tasks by transforming scattered data into actionable insights.
- Customize applications for unique business needs with various prebuilt components.

A range of solutions exists on their platform, catering to diverse use cases, including:

- **Field Sales**: Empower field representatives with tools to close deals quickly.
- **Dashboards**: Create real-time metrics to gain insights into business performance.
- **Custom CRMs**: Design a customer relationship management tool tailored to specific workflows.
- **Inventory Management**: Simplify inventory tracking with intuitive interfaces.

**Team and Culture:**

With a team of 40 passionate employees, Glide emphasizes collaboration and innovation. Their technical prowess and background set a strong foundation for delivering high-quality, user-friendly software solutions. Led by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, the team embodies a commitment to pushing the boundaries of no-code development.

**Partnerships and Clients:**

Glide serves over 100,000 organizations, including high-performing companies like Hilton, Costco, and Sotheby’s. Their customer stories highlight how Glide improves operational efficiency, enhances customer service, and drives sales through bespoke application solutions.

**Conclusion:**

In an industry ripe for disruption, Glide stands out by providing a platform that democratizes app development. Their intuitive no-code approach is not just about efficiency—it’s about enabling creativity and empowering individuals and teams to bring their ideas to life, all while placing the responsibility of development in the hands of the users. If app creation has long been the domain of code-savvy developers, Glide is shifting that narrative, one app at a time.
